title: CSV Content Guesser
description: Upload any CSV file and receive an AI-generated guess of the dataset's topic or purpose. No predefined schema required.

pages.name: Home
pages.purpose: Provide file upload, trigger analysis, and display the AI guess.

interactions: User selects a CSV file → Papa Parse reads the file into csvData.
User clicks 'Analyze' → isLoading set true, first 10 rows (or header) are stringified and sent to window.geaRuntimeLLM with a prompt asking the model to guess the dataset's subject.
AI response is stored in guessResult and displayed in the result card.
If parsing fails or AI returns an error, errorMessage is set and shown via SweetAlert2.
Result and loading state are persisted across sessions using window.geaRuntimeStore (optional).
acceptance_criteria: User can upload any .csv file up to 5 MB.
File is parsed without errors; first 10 rows are used for analysis.
The app calls window.geaRuntimeLLM with a clear prompt and receives a non‑empty textual guess.
Loading spinner appears while awaiting the AI response.
The guessed description is displayed prominently and can be copied.
Errors (invalid file, parse failure, AI failure) show a SweetAlert2 toast with a helpful message.
UI is responsive and styled with Tailwind/DaisyUI.
